text:
It is said that when people fall in love, they glow very differently. For Sushmita Sen and Boyfriend Rohman Shawl, this saying is definitely true. The couple has been seeing each other since a long time and Sush has never hid the fact that there is a man in her life whom she dearly loves.
Apart from being a part of Sush's life, Rohman is also close to both of her daughters and the way they spend time with each other is a good enough proof. Be it Diwali or attending a friend's wedding, the couple looks very much in love!

While Indians still look down on people who fall in love without seeing the age-gap, people's acceptance towards the couple's love proves that India is finally growing up and letting people just be.
It also proves that be it dating someone of the same sex or dating someone who is years younger to you, love is love!
